title: Workshop for Improving Language Education Design Based on Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Strengthening instructional design capabilities by integrating learning analytics into language education programs for workplace performance improvement

learning_goals: Learners can analyze language acquisition patterns with 80% accuracy using learning analytics tools
Learners can design three or more personalized feedback strategies based on learning data

Learners can analyze formative assessment results (quiz scores, practical evaluations, feedback surveys) every two weeks, create educational design improvement plans, and implement them through three or more specific action plans (e.g., supplementing educational materials, adjusting practical time, adding supplementary resources).
Learners execute 1:1 learning consultations within 48 hours using predictive indicators of declining participation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
